duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and ensure that the seafood department maintains excellent guest service, merchandising programs, and operational standards to maximize sales.
Create a selling environment by utilizing effective selling skills and maintaining desired levels of inventory and supplies.
Operate the seafood department according to merchandising and operational guidelines, ensuring high quality, freshness, and in-stock conditions.
Maintain safety and sanitation standards in all areas that come in contact with seafood and in prep areas, coolers, freezers, and sales floor.
Provide guidance, orientation, training, and feedback to seafood department staff to ensure satisfactory performance standards and guest interaction.
Perform product preparation, receiving, stocking, and guest service to achieve department standards.
Communicate guest requests/concerns to management and make PA announcements for sale and promotional items.
Perform all other duties as assigned by management.
